title: WildFly Mini Conference Recap
content: Many thanks to all participants of the first WildFly Mini Conference!  Our first WildFly Mini Conference took place on March 6. We had four talks on the and many interesting questions and feedback. The feedback we have received so far has been very positive and has encouraged us to organize similar events for the community in the future. Stay tuned!  If you have missed the conference, you can watch the recording at  If you haven’t done so far, please let us know how you liked the conference using our .  For those who want to take a look at the slides, here are the links.   *    *    *    *   You’ll find the links also on the and in the description of the .
